title: Phase and interface engineering of a Ru–Sn nanocatalyst for enhanced alkaline hydrogen oxidation reaction
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,5922-5930
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02010C, Paper
Licheng Wei, Wei Yan, Zhongliang Huang, Ruchun Li, Qingyu Kong, Wei-Hsiang Huang, Chih-Wen Pao, Zhiwei Hu, Haixin Lin, Nanjun Chen, Yong Xu, Hongbo Geng, Xiaoqing Huang
The heterointerface of fcc0.42 Ru–Sn catalyst exhibits strong interfacial synergy for balancing H2 adsorption and enhancing alkaline HOR activity, thereby significantly improving the performance of anion exchange membrane fuel cells.
